title: 100% Luxury Natural Linen Pillowcases | Housewife Pillow cases 50 x 75cm | Luxurious Hotel Quality Bedding | Belgian French Flax Woven in Portugal | Dove Grey
features: Our washed linen pillow cases will keep you feeling cool & refreshed in the summer, yet toasty & cosy in the winter. Your most endearing companion for all seasons – enjoy their wonderfully breathable & temperature regulating qualities all year round. The best part? Our linen’s enduringly beautiful texture gets even softer over time. Ready for you to sink into your most indulgent sleeps ever, night after night & year after year.
Made from the finest quality flax, exclusively woven in Portugal, for an indulgent sleep experience.
Oeko-Tex certified, ensuring that our bedding is free from harmful substances and chemicals and friendly to the environment.

the epitome of eco-luxury. Crafted with the finest natural materials, they offer a vintage-like softness that invites ultimate comfort. Pre-washed for that perfect lived-in feel and conveniently machine washable. Discover the joys of sustainable luxury with these ethically made pillowcases.
description: Product Description Crafted from 100% Belgian & French flax The Linen Pillowcases With an impressive ability to keep you cool & refreshed in the summer, yet toasty & cosy in the winter—indulge in the wonderfully breathable & temperature regulating qualities of the finest European flax. Your perfect pillowcase pair for all seasons, night after night & year after year. Previous page Next page No more poking out Our pillowcases, like our duvet covers, feature a deep inner stop pocket to prevent your pillow escaping during the night. Beautifully soft Our linen is pre-washed so it has that exquisite antique linen feel, providing the ultimate softness right from the first night. Standard Size (50 x 75cm) Available in Superking size too, visit our store. Classic, Versatile Design Our neat, sleek linen pillowcases are thoughtfully crafted to offer effortless versatility—mix, match and style your way. What is the linen crafted from? Crafted from the finest 100% Belgian & French flax Is the linen prewashed? Our linen is pre-washed so it has that exquisite antique linen feel, providing the ultimate softness right from the first night.
